DOC.brief_summary: Treatments stable angina include drug therapy calcium-channel blocker , beta blocker , ACEI/ARB . To obtain good prognosis patient coronary artery disease , prevent correct progression atherosclerosis dyslipidemia important relieve angina symptom . Dysfunction microvessel one important factor patient coronary artery disease . Recently , develop new non-invasive method evaluate microvessel fundus . With method , compare effect drug ( beta blocker , CCB , ARB ) .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Vascular Remodeling Between Different Antianginal Medication Evaluated Noninvasive ECG-gated Fundus Photographic Evaluation
DOC.criteria: Stable angina patient whose coronary lesion confirm angiography receives PCI Unstable Angina/NSTEMI patient complete PCI main lesion Either systolic > 130mmHg diastolic > 80mmHg , patient antihypertensive drug STEMI patient within one month Variant Angina Liver function abnormality renal failure History Hypersensitivity test drug Severe heart failure ( NYHA class > 3 ) uncorrectable hematologic disease Woman possible pregnant Uncontrolled diabetes Expected life span < one year
